input_args.text: 'MONOPOLY: Banks, Then Media, Now Voting Machine Companies – With One Company Supplying Over 50% Of Us Voting Machines. by IWB · October 27, 2016 Tweet \nWe’ve all seen what happened when the banks became too big to fail, too big to jail after Bill Clinton’s administration began a wave of bank consolidations. Now internet providers and content providers are proposing to consolidate in a way that will result in even more information control & privacy concerns. And under the radar, the electronic voting machine companies are rapidly consolidating as well, with one company supplying over 50% of US voting machines. And all the players pay the Clintons to play. \nAlex Jones gives you the reasons why the global monopolies and mafias are pushing back against Donald Trump so hard.'
